content: maple leaf hat squirrellywolf designs materials abbreviations 1 ball of worsted yarn in main color k = knit 1 partial ball of worsted yarn in alternate color p = purl size 4 needles k2tog = knit 2 stitches together as if they were size 5 needles one this is a decrease scissors large sewing needle 1 instructions using size 4 needles and main color cast on 96 stitches join in the round k1 p1 until piece measures 1 inch 2 5 cm switch to size 5 needles using main color and alternate color work the following chart of the next 27 rounds as with all color work patterns it is important to wrap strands every 3 stitches to maintain the integrity of the fabric after completing the chart continue knitting in main color until hat length is at least 7 inches 17 75 cm if you prefer a longer hat knit an additional inch 2 5 cm to work the crown of the hat work the following row switching to 4 double pointed needles when necessary 2 1 k6 k2tog repeat til end of row 2 knit all stitches til end of row 3 k5 k2tog repeat til end of row 4 knit all stitches til end of row 5 k4 k2tog repeat til end of row 6 knit all stitches til end of row 7 k3 k2tog repeat til end of row 8 knit all stitches til end of row 9 k2 k2tog repeat til end of row 10 knit all stitches til end of row 11 k1 k2tog repeat til end of row 12 k2tog repeat til end of row cut yarn leaving a 12-inch tail or so thread onto a tapestry needle and thread through all stitches pulling through the center of the hat tie off and weave in ends 3
